attributes.action: not to go ahead with the vets charging for vet prescriptions in October 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vet fees are more than high enough as it is at present. If fees are going to be charged for prescriptions it will create more problems with animals being abandoned and made to suffer.  I feel very strongly against this idea/ It takes two seconds for a vet to write out a prescription and possibly a lot of suffering for an animal.  Also a lot of heartache and worry for an animal lover like myself.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
